subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New Hack is up on my site
author: Debbie Tejada
full_text:
FYI, I was in Bed Bath & Beyond today and found a small speaker on  
their clearance rack. It plugs into the earphone jack of your sound  
device, and has fairly decent sound for something so small and cheap.  
They had about 4 or 5, I bet other BB&B stores would have them. Photo  
attached below. Its a Spi Mini Hi-Fi Speaker, they had black or white,  
for $4.99 (half price). It takes 2 AAA batteries. Works great with my  
new RS 12-470.

Deb T
